source.description: Data for the the XML Query XMP use cases

schema.description: A Schema having mixed, elementOnly, and empty elements with the same name

test-case.name: fn-deep-equalint2args-1
test-case.description: Evaluates The "deep-equal" function with the arguments set as follows: $parameter1 = xs:int(lower bound) $parameter2 = xs:int(lower bound)

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal("a string")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal("a string", "a string", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint", "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal("a string", "a string", "http://www.example.com/COLLATION/NOT/SUPPORTED")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal("a string", "a string", ())`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal("a string", "a string", "http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions/collation/codepoint")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal((), ()) eq true()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal(xs:float("NaN"), xs:float("NaN"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal(xs:double("NaN"), xs:double("NaN"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal(xs:float("NaN"), xs:double("NaN"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `deep-equal(xs:double("NaN"), xs:float("NaN"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal(xs:float("NaN"), xs:float(0)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal(xs:float(0), xs:float("NaN")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal(xs:double(0), xs:double("NaN")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-15
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal(xs:double("NaN"), xs:double(0)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-16
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal(xs:decimal("1"), xs:anyURI("example.com")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-17
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal(QName("example.com", "ncname"), 3e2))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-18
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal((1, 2, xs:anyURI("example.com")), (1, 2, 3)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-19
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal((1, xs:decimal("2.2"), 3), (1, 2, 3)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-20
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal((true(), 2, 3), (1, 2, 3)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-21
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal((1, 2, 3), (1, 2, QName("example.com", "ncname"))))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-22
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal((1, 2, 3), (1, xs:hexBinary("FF"), 3)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-23
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `not(deep-equal((1, 2, 3), (xs:base64Binary("FFFF"), 2, 3)))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqDeepEqualFunc-24

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-14
test-case.description: Ensure processing instructions are ignored if children of a document node.
test-case.test: declare variable $d1 := document { <?target data?>, text{"some text"}}; declare variable $d2 := document {text{"some text"}}; deep-equal($d1, $d2)

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-15
test-case.description: Ensure processing instructions are ignored if children of a document node(#2).
test-case.test: declare variable $d1 := document {()}; declare variable $d2 := document {<?target data?>}; deep-equal($d1, $d2)

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-16
test-case.description: Ensure processing instructions are ignored if children of a document node.
test-case.test: declare variable $d1 := document { <?target data?>, text{"some text"}}; declare variable $d2 := document {text{"some text"}}; deep-equal($d1, $d2)

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-17
test-case.description: Ensure processing instructions are ignored if children of a document node(#2).
test-case.test: declare variable $d1 := document {()}; declare variable $d2 := document {<?target data?>}; deep-equal($d1, $d2)

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-18
test-case.description: fn:deep-equal() with mixed content.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-19
test-case.description: fn:deep-equal() with mixed content(#2).

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-20
test-case.description: One of the operands has two text nodes, and hence it evaluate to false.
test-case.test: declare variable $d1 := <e a="1" b="2">te<?target data?>xt</e>; declare variable $d2 := <e b="2" a="1">text</e>; deep-equal($d1, $d2), deep-equal($d2, $d1)

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-21
test-case.description: Processing instructions inside elements are ignored.
test-case.test: declare variable $d1 := <e a="1" b="2"><?target data?>text</e>; declare variable $d2 := <e b="2" a="1">text</e>; deep-equal($d1, $d2), deep-equal($d2, $d1)

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-22
test-case.description: One of the operands has two text nodes besides the comment, and hence it evaluate to false.
test-case.test: declare variable $d1 := <e a="1" b="2">te<!-- content -->xt</e>; declare variable $d2 := <e b="2" a="1">text</e>; deep-equal($d1, $d2), deep-equal($d2, $d1)

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-23
test-case.description: Comments inside elements are ignored.
test-case.test: declare variable $d1 := <e a="1" b="2"><!-- content -->text</e>; declare variable $d2 := <e b="2" a="1">text</e>; deep-equal($d1, $d2), deep-equal($d2, $d1)

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-24
test-case.description: Compare attribute nodes.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-25
test-case.description: Compare attribute nodes in a weird order.
test-case.test: deep-equal((attribute name2 {"content"}, attribute name {"content"}), (attribute name {"content"}, attribute name2 {"content"}))

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-26
test-case.description: Compare operands with attributes nodes of different size.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-27
test-case.description: Compare operands with attributes nodes of different size(#2).
test-case.test: deep-equal((attribute name {"content"}, attribute name {"content"}), attribute name {"content"})

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-28
test-case.description: Test deep-equalness of two attribute nodes.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-29
test-case.description: Test deep-equalness of two attribute nodes.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-30
test-case.description: Test deep-equalness of two attribute nodes that has the same name, but different string values.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-31
test-case.description: Test deep-equalness of two attribute nodes that has same text content but different names.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-32
test-case.description: Test deep-equalness of two attribute nodes that has identical text content but different names.

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-33
test-case.description: Namespace prefixes and namespace nodes are ignored

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-34
test-case.description: Parent node is ignored

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-35
test-case.description: Type annotation is ignored for atomic values

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-36
test-case.description: Compare typed value, not string value
test-case.test: deep-equal(validate type xs:integer {<e>2012</e>}, validate type xs:gYear{<e>2012</e>})

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-37
test-case.description: Type annotation is ignored on nodes
test-case.test: deep-equal(validate type xs:integer {<e>2012</e>}, validate type xs:decimal{<e>2012</e>})

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-38
test-case.description: Element with mixed content is not equal to similar element with element-only content

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-39
test-case.description: Element with mixed content is not equal to similar element with simple content

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-40
test-case.description: Handle dependency on implicit timezone

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-41
test-case.description: List of one integer equals union of one integer

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-42
test-case.description: Empty List of integers not equal to empty string

test-case.name: K2-SeqDeepEqualFunc-43
test-case.description: An error evaluating an argument (as distinct from a comparison error) is propagated (Saxon bug 3714)

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-001
test-case.description: Test deep-equal ignores processing instructions and comments in elements.

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-002
test-case.description: Test deep-equal on processing instructions with different values.
test-case.test: let $doc1 := <?cheese brie?> let $doc2 := <?cheese stilton?> return deep-equal($doc1, $doc2)

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-003
test-case.description: Test deep-equal on processing instructions with different names.
test-case.test: let $doc1 := <?foo test?> let $doc2 := <?bar test?> return deep-equal($doc1, $doc2)

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-004
test-case.description: Test deep-equal on equal processing instructions
test-case.test: let $doc1 := <?foo bar?> let $doc2 := <?foo bar?> return deep-equal($doc1, $doc2)

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-005
test-case.description: Test deep-equal simplifying to fn:empty
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer)as xs:integer* { 1 to $x }; deep-equal((local:f(3), 2, local:f(1)), (local:f(3), 2))

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-006
test-case.description: Test deep-equal simplifying to fn:empty
test-case.test: declare function local:f($x as xs:integer) as xs:integer* { 1 to $x }; deep-equal((local:f(3), 2), (local:f(3), 2, local:f(1)))

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-007
test-case.description: Test deep-equal on comparison requiring dynamic context

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-008
test-case.description: Test that deep equal compares untypedAtomic values correctly

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-009
test-case.description: test fn:deep equal (was duplicate cbcl-deep-equal-001)

test-case.name: cbcl-deep-equal-010
test-case.description: Test that deep equal compares untypedAtomic values correctly

modified.change: Add dependency on XQ10+ because query contains constructors

test-case.test: deep-equal((<a />, xs:untypedAtomic("a"), xs:untypedAtomic("P1Y"), 2.0), (<a />, xs:untypedAtomic("a"), xs:yearMonthDuration("P12M"), xs:untypedAtomic(" 2")))
